text: every day is a great day to celebrate we
call it mlk day we celebrate
this civil rights leader martin luther
king jr was born and raised in atlanta

which led to mlk junior attending the

to organize against social injustice
like the montgomery bus boycott to push
for equality
the march on washington using his voice

and the selma voting rights movement

this is why we honor dr martin luther
